mapper.select: select userID, email, nick, password, name, registerTime, registerIP, loginTime, loginIP, sex, what, image, phone, mobile, townID, address, postalCode, deliveryTypeID, deliveryTimeID, payTypeID, userMoney, buyScore, activationCode, activationDate, firstName, lastName, hobby, declaration, birthday, degreeID, incomeTypeID, joinStatus, onlineFlag, topicNumber, voteNumber, fansNumber, followNumber, userLevel, membersFlag, activationCodeJoinCommunity, website, food, books, plot, programs, entertainment, tourist, digital, sports, newspapers, bgID, communityTownID, personality, figure, dressStyle, interests, travelDestination, loveToReadMagazinesAndBooks, oftenGoToWebSite, likeStar, goodAtSports, likeMovie, likeFood, likeMakingFriends, lastActionTime, otherAccount, otherAccountFlag, otherAccounTypeID, otherAccountUserImage from user where userID = #{id}
